description:
The ESV Bible at your fingertips––read and share God’s Word anywhere, anytime. 

• Use. Features an intuitive, user-friendly interface. Finding a verse is fast and easy. Quickly jump to cross-references or footnotes and back to your passage.

• Audio. Listen to an audio reading of the biblical text (internet connection required) 

• Search. Ever had a verse come to mind but can’t remember where it’s found? Simply search for it!

• Write. With the app’s note taking features, capture your thoughts and observations while listening to a sermon or during personal Bible study.

• Highlight. Highlight verses by simply tapping on them. Save them in your favorites for future reference.

• Sync. Sync highlighted verses, favorited verses, and notes with your free ESVBible.org account.

• Share. Share verses with friends and family via text message, email, Facebook, or Twitter!
releaseNotes:
- Updated the ESV text to the 2011 edition.
- Fixed Bible text randomly jumping backwards.
- Fixed audio Bible not playing when the app is in the background or the home screen is locked.
- Fixed a syncing glitch.
- Fixed a startup crash.
- Fixed issues that caused the app to freeze.

Other Fixes
- Fixed initial tutorial video freezing the app after playing.
- Fixed Bible text jumping back after highlighting, adding favorites, or adding notes.
- Fixed a number of bugs with playing audio
- Added the current verse for audio to the lock screen and command center.
- Added the ability to skip audio forward or backwards by verse from lock screen and command center.
- Added the ability to use the remote control when playing audio via AirPlay.
- Fixed the Play/Pause toggle on headphones not working when audio was playing.
- Added the ability to clear the history.
- Fixed posting to Facebook and Twitter broken on iPad.
- Fixed login on iPad getting cut off.
- Fixed the top of the intro and study tabs being cut off by 20 pixels on iPad.
- Fixed toggling between Study and ESV tab losing your place in the Study tab when you hadn't scrolled in the ESV tab.
- Fixed when you go to the study tab, scroll down, tap on a reference, then tap on the orange "Tap to Return" button, 
  it wouldn't take you back to where you were.
- Fixed long book titles running up against the ESV seal and making it hard to tap the seal.
- Fixed top title getting cut off and showing ... in the middle.
- Fixed the send and cancel buttons on sharing via email from being invisible due to white on white.
- Fixed the text selection end markers were cut off on iPad.
- Fixed it being hard to select text.
- Fixed notes view on iPad to sit on top on the keyboard rather than going under it.  This would only let you edit 15 lines of your note.
- Fixed adding a highlight could be slow.
